Web Development

Front-End Developer

I am a front-end web designer and developer

Skilled in web design with HTML, CSS and Javascript. I am deepening my JavaScript knowledge, learning ES6, and Angular.

Other technologies

I am also kowledgeable in back-end development with MySQL, Object Oriented PHP and MVC frameworks.

Goals & Projects

I am learning the latest front-end technologies. On my list of learning priorities I have: deeper JS, ES6, Angular, Cordova/Ionic, and Node.js. I am interested in document design, data visualisation, and application design and development. I am workng on a personal project for a web app for freelance language teachers to manage their schedules and invoices.

Background

I have a bachelor's degree in Social Anthrology and Philosophy. I am an experienced English language trainer, copy-writer and French-English translator. I have also worked in televeision post-production and scheduling.

How I learned web development (so far)
